statements: SELECT id, name, source1_geometry, source2_geometry FROM spatial_analysis_data;
SELECT name, source1_geometry, id, source2_geometry FROM spatial_analysis_data;
SELECT source2_geometry, source1_geometry, id, name FROM spatial_analysis_data;
SELECT id, source2_geometry, source1_geometry, name FROM spatial_analysis_data;
SELECT name, id, source1_geometry, source2_geometry FROM spatial_analysis_data;
SELECT id, name, source1_geometry FROM spatial_analysis_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM spatial_analysis_data WHERE name LIKE '%abc%';
SELECT id, ST_AsText(source1_geometry) AS source1_geometry_text, ST_Area(source2_geometry) AS source2_area FROM spatial_analysis_data WHERE ST_Area(source2_geometry) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM spatial_analysis_data ORDER BY name DESC, id ASC;
SELECT id, name, ST_Distance(source1_geometry, source2_geometry) AS distance FROM spatial_analysis_data WHERE ST_Distance(source1_geometry, source2_geometry) < 10;
SELECT * FROM SpatialData1;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM SpatialData1 WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM SpatialData1 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT city, country FROM SpatialData2 WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT city, country FROM SpatialData2 ORDER BY city ASC, country DESC;
SELECT * FROM SpatialData1 WHERE id = 1;
SELECT city, country FROM SpatialData2 WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM SpatialData1 WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT * FROM SpatialData2 WHERE city LIKE '%York';
SELECT city, country FROM SpatialData2 ORDER BY country DESC, city ASC;
SELECT * FROM spatial_data;
SELECT location FROM spatial_data WHERE data_source='source1';
SELECT id, result_value FROM analysis_results WHERE result_value > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM spatial_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT data_source FROM spatial_data JOIN analysis_results ON spatial_id = id WHERE result_value < 0.3;
SELECT id, location, data_source FROM spatial_data;
SELECT data_source, id, location FROM spatial_data;
SELECT result_value, spatial_id, id FROM analysis_results;
SELECT id, name FROM data_sources;
SELECT id, location, data_source FROM spatial_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM spatial_data_1;
SELECT location_name, region_name FROM spatial_data_2;
SELECT id, measurement_value, measurement_unit FROM spatial_data_3 WHERE measurement_value > 100;
SELECT longitude, latitude FROM spatial_data_1 ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM spatial_analysis_results WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM spatial_data_1 WHERE latitude > 0
SELECT id, location_name FROM spatial_data_2 ORDER BY location_name DESC
SELECT * FROM spatial_data_3 WHERE measurement_unit LIKE '%meter%'
SELECT id, region_name FROM spatial_data_2 WHERE region_name = 'Europe'
SELECT id, analysis_date FROM spatial_analysis_results ORDER BY analysis_date ASC
SELECT * FROM spatial_data_source1;
SELECT id, attribute1, attribute2 FROM spatial_data_source1;
SELECT id, geometry FROM spatial_data_source2;
SELECT id, result, score FROM analysis_results ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT id, result_id, geometry, analysis_summary FROM spatial_data_joined WHERE result_id = 1;
SELECT id, attribute1, attribute2 FROM spatial_data_source1 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT result, score FROM analysis_results WHERE score > 0.8 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT id, result_id, summary FROM analysis_summary WHERE result_id = 1001;
SELECT id, geometry, attribute3 FROM spatial_data_source2 WHERE attribute4 < 50 ORDER BY attribute4 ASC;
SELECT id, result_id, analysis_summary, matched_attributes FROM spatial_data_joined WHERE result_id = 2005;
